description: This file defines the AppSearchBar widget, a customizable search input component with a prefix icon, clear button, and a submit button, designed for use in Flutter mobile apps.

classes.name: AppSearchBar
classes.description: A StatefulWidget providing a styled search bar with prefix icon, clear button, and submit button.

classes.name: _AppSearchBarState
classes.description: Private State class managing the internal control logic and UI for AppSearchBar.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the search input and triggers the onChanged callback with an empty string.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Triggers the onSubmit callback with the trimmed current text.
